ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_istdrg | |- ( R e. TopDRing <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simp1bi | |- ( R e. TopDRing -> R e. TopRing ) |
